desc.data: ¶= mathematical symbol 'ell'¶= liter (traditional symbol)¶• despite its character name, this symbol is derived from a special italicized version of the small letter l¶• the SI recommended symbol for liter is 006C or 004C¶→ (mathematical script small l - 1D4C1)¶≈ [font] 006C latin small letter l
